Name: Laddoo
Description: Laddoo is a sweet sphere dessert made up of flour,fat(butter/ghee/oil) and sugar and also ingredients like chopped  nuts or dried raisins.

Name: Rasmalai
Description: Rasmalai is Bengali dessert made with cheese being soaked in sweet,flavoured milk.

Name: Gulab Jamun
Description: This is spongy milky balls soaked in rose scented syrup with stir together ingredients like milk powder,flour,baking powder and cardomom.

Name: Coconut Laddoo
Description: coconut laddoos are delicious sweetened balls made with coconut,cardomom powder and milk

Name: Barfi
Description: barfi or Burfi is  a dense milk based sweet  from indian subcontinent having main ingredients condensed milk and sugar.

Name: Chamcham
Description: Made with curdling milk and shaped in cylinderical shape peices.these are cooked in sugar syrup to get a soft,light,spongy texture

Name: Gajrela
Description: Filled with goodness of carrots,dry fruits and nuts,Gajrela is made with fresh,scullent carrots,milk and butter

Name: Petha
Description: Petha is a translucent soft candy in a rectagular and cylindrical shape made from ash ground vegtables such as white melon or white pumpkin

Name: Sohan Papdi
Description: It is a popular dessert having crispy and flaky texture also called sohan halwa made with besan,flour,ghee and sugar
